text: 2.5 Epe 5.22, Kol 3.18, 1 Ti 2.11, 6.1, 1 Pi 3.1, 3.5 Bin takaw sayn tep agɨl, gos nɨgtep gɨnɨgel. God wɨdɨn adek sɨŋak gach sek ma yenɨgel. Wog kal kɨli ke ak gɨl, binɨb okok dɨtep gɨl, nɨgɨmɨl sɨkop muk okok mɨdɨl gɨnɨgel. Tap anɨb okok anɨgenɨgabal, binɨb ogɨnap nɨŋɨd, God takaw ne ak ma agjunɨgabal.
